  • Method Details

    • createIslands

      private void createIslands()
      Creates twelve islands of the game.

    • setupMotherNature

      public void setupMotherNature()
      This method places mother nature on a random island.

    • mergeNearIslands

      public void mergeNearIslands(Island islandToPreserve, List<Player> players, Player[] professors) throws EndGameException
      This method merges two or more adjacent islands with the same dominator. Firstly, update the influence on the island where mother nature is on. It merges when dominator is not null, i.e. there is a dominator.
      Parameters:
      islandToPreserve - island to not remove during merging.
      players - the list of players.
      professors - the array with professors associated to the players.
      Throws:
      EndGameException - when there are only three groups of islands.

    • mergeAndNotify

      private void mergeAndNotify(Island islandToPreserve, Island islandToRemove) throws EndGameException
      Merges two islands removing the one that has no Mother Nature on. Then, it checks how many groups of islands remain in the game.
      Parameters:
      islandToPreserve - the island to not remove during merging.
      islandToRemove - the island to remove during merging.
      Throws:
      EndGameException - if there are only three groups of islands after merging and so, the game has to finish.

    • existsIsland

      public boolean existsIsland(int idIsland)
      Parameters:
      idIsland - the id of the island to find.
      Returns:
      true if the island with that id exists, false otherwise.

    • checkNumberIslands

      private void checkNumberIslands() throws EndGameException
      Checks if the number of remaining groups of islands is three.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the number of groups islands is three because the game must finish.
      EndGameException

    • nextIsland

      public Island nextIsland(Island currentIsland)
      Parameters:
      currentIsland - the current island.
      Returns:
      next island on the left.

    • prevIsland

      public Island prevIsland(Island currentIsland)
      Parameters:
      currentIsland - the current island.
      Returns:
      previous island on the right.

    • getIslands

      public List<Island> getIslands()

    • getIslandByID

      public Island getIslandByID(int id) throws IllegalClientInputException
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the island to return.
      Returns:
      the island with the id passed by parameter.
      Throws:
      IllegalClientInputException - if the island with that id doesn't exist.

    • resetIslandsInfluenceStrategy

      public void resetIslandsInfluenceStrategy()
      Resets the influence strategy to default strategy when the turn is over.
